p: Cytotoxicity assays used NCTC929 fibroblasts lines were grown in Minimal Essential Medium (Sigma). The culture medium was supplemented with heat inactivated FBS (10%), penicillin G (100 U/mL) and streptomycin (100 mg/mL). Cultures were maintained at 37 Â°C in a humidified atmosphere with 5% CO 2. The viability of the lines was evaluated through the use of resazurin as a colorimetric method ( 23).
